findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead and increases unnecessarily the gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming convention guidelines.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: An unused state variable is declared in the contract but is never used.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract is missing required events that could cause issues with its arithmetic.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract has dead code that is never executed or reached during normal contract execution.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: The contract performs divisions before multiplications which may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured without proper checks, which can lead to problems when the value is zero.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The contract does not lock the pragma version, which can lead to vulnerabilities and undiscovered bugs.
